briefTitle: A Study of Adalimumab in Japanese Subjects With Intestinal Behçet's Disease
officialTitle: A Multi-Center Study of Adalimumab in Japanese Subjects With Intestinal Behçet's Disease
summary: To investigate efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics of adalimumab subcutaneous (sc) for Japanese subjects with intestinal Behçet's disease who are refractory to conventional therapies.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Marked Improvement at Week 24
